Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Fabio Converti Oepartment of Architecture Seconda Università di Napoli Via San Lorenzo 81031 Aversa (Ce) Italy . Ref.: Erasmus visit Oear Fabio Converti, With reference to our previous contacts, it is our pleasure to confirm the invitation to have you at our Universityfrom 19-09-2012 to 25-09-2012 for a meeting on research activities of common interest and to give a lecture on "La pianificazione dalla piccola alla grande scala, tramite l'uso di nuove tecnologie, nel Parco Nazionale del Cilento e Vallo di Diano patrimonio Unesco situata nel sud Italia" the 16th October 2012, within the framework of LLP-Erasmus Programme. Your University, through the Erasmus project, will fund your travel and stay.

With reference to our previous contacts, it is our pleasure to confirm the invitation to have you at our Universityfrom 28-09-2012 to 18-10-2012 for a meeting on research activities of common interest and to give a lecture on "Urban drawing and design: The case study of Unesco sites in south Italy" the 16th October 2012, within the framework of LLP-Erasmus Programme. Your University, through the Erasmus project, will fund your travel and stay. Conferenza Urban drawing and designo The case study of UNESCO sites in South Italy Studi disciplinari e metodologici innovativi nel campo de la rappresentazione della Città e del Paesaggio
